title: [Sherlock] Review and Consolidate Total Recall Documentation
description: Review the three 'Total Recall' documents (A_MESSAGE_FOR_FUTURE_ME.md, AI_OPERATIONS_MANUAL.md, DW8_OPERATING_SYSTEM.md) for clarity, consistency, and completeness. Consolidate where necessary and ensure they provide a comprehensive strategic overview for a context-wiped AI. This is a Sherlock-mode task.

acceptance_criteria.description: A clear, consistent, and comprehensive set of 'Total Recall' documents is produced.
